text: Chu Chu and the Philly Flash is a 1981 American comedy movie directed by David Lowell Rich and starring Alan Arkin, Carol Burnett, Jack Warden, Danny Aiello, Danny Glover, Sid Haig and Neile Adams. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was a box office bomb. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1981 comedy movies Category:1980s spy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American spy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by David Lowell Rich
title: Chu Chu and the Philly Flash
